original_text: Now when they had testified and spoken the word of the Lord, they returned to Jerusalem, preaching the gospel to many villages of the Samaritans.
korean_text: 두 사도가 주의 말씀을 증언하여 말한 후 예루살렘으로 돌아갈새 사마리아인의 여러 마을에서 복음을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: Now when they had testified and spoken the word of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 증언하고 주의 말씀을 전했을 때에,

sentences.original_text: to many villages of the Samaritans.
